text: Whoever, with respect to the allowances or exemptions authorized by sections 19-101.01 to 19-101.05, (1) makes a false affidavit, (2) willfully violates an order of the Probate Division, or (3) willfully violates a provision of this chapter, shall be fined not more than $2,500 for each offense.

chapter.text: Rights of Surviving Spouse or Domestic Partner, and Children.
